title: Simple HTML/CSS Creation Test
description: Create a simple HTML page with basic styling
instruction:
Create a simple web page that:

1. Creates an HTML file called 'index.html'
2. Contains a heading 'Hello from frontend worker!'
3. Includes basic CSS styling in a 'styles.css' file
4. The page should have a blue background and white text

This is a minimal test to verify the worker can create web files in its workspace.

success_indicators: index.html is created with proper structure
